ops.description: Bank[6][0] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Man, the Boss was REALLY
in a bad mood today…
Or was it one of his better days?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “If you get lost in the desert,
just keep going Northeast.
If you're lucky, you'll make it back here.”

ops.description: { let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][3] = pos.x; Bank[6][5] = pos.y; Bank[6][7] = pos.z; Bank[6][9] = pos.triangleId; }

dialogStrings:
“If you get lost in the desert,
just keep going Northeast.
If you're lucky, you'll make it back here.”

“Man, the Boss was REALLY
in a bad mood today…
Or was it one of his better days?”
